name: The Employee Of The Month! (PixelItchio)
description:
Welcome!

You've been hired by the great company "J.O.B." and your boss wants to see if you're qualified. 'think you can be promoted? Finish the job before time runs out so you can pass to the next test!

Quick Tip :

Keyboard (arrows, a/w/s/d, ctrl, p, space).

Level 2 : in the yellow/black zone, "ctrl" changes the lights; the green light tells you where the device will move in the upper area.

Boss level : there's no way to know where the robot will shoot; a good place to stand appears in the screenshot but keep moving.

Pressing "P" or "space" pauses the game; write the password to replay your favorite level.

Bug :

If your player keeps moving on its own or freezes, tap the left ctrl (release the object you're holding first).

Level4 (html version) : sometimes, pausing the game makes a black screen; restart the level.

Boss level (html version. Stage : level2) : the screen blinks; not good if you're sensitive to flash but playable.

Level 8 : if you give fuel while another customer waits for the fuel pump, that customer could lose patience. You can even win while doing nothing... If the character gets stuck in the fuelpump : restart the level (html version).

Made with GameMaker (1.4)
 Music made with BeepBox.
SoundFX made with SFXR.

Have Fun!
